title: Admins Settings Page - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: The Admins Settings page contains general functions that apply to all admins. On the Settings page ( Settings > Administration > Admins > Settings icon) you can: Set Log In Attempts Set Idle Timeout Set Password Expiration Disallow concurrent log ins by the same admin. This means if an admin logs in from a second browser instance, they will be logged out from their first browser session.
